```{r}
library(friends)
library(tidyverse)

friends |>
  group_by(speaker) |>
  summarize(count = n()) |>
  arrange(desc(count))
```

```{r}
questions <- friends |>
  select(text, speaker) |>
  filter(str_detect(speaker, "Rachel Green|Monica Geller|Phoebe Buffay|Joey Tribbiani$|Chandler Bing|Ross Geller")) |>
  filter(str_detect(text, "\\?")) |>
  group_by(speaker) |>
  summarize(num_questions = n())

totalnumber <- friends |>
  select(text, speaker) |>
  filter(str_detect(speaker, "Rachel Green|Monica Geller|Phoebe Buffay|Joey Tribbiani$|Chandler Bing|Ross Geller")) |>
  group_by(speaker) |>
  summarize(num_utterances = n())
  
  
questionsandtotal <- full_join(questions, totalnumber) |>
  mutate(propquestions = num_questions/num_utterances)

questions
totalnumber
questionsandtotal
```

count the total number of question marks, not just the number of strings with question marks
